name: Action 53 Volume 3: Revenge of the Twins
name_original: Action 53 Volume 3: Revenge of the Twins
description:
Are you ready to jump, warp, race, bomb, mash, fling, bounce, stab, and quack your way through some of the freshest NES titles from today's dopest developers?

Then you need Action 53 Volume 3: Revenge of the Twins!

Featuring games developed for the NesDev 2016 Coding Competition, as well as numerous other contributions, this jam-packed multicart is sure to provide hours of fun for even the most discerning NES enthusiasts!

Contents
  • Twin Dragons (NesDev Competition Version) by Antoine Gohin
  • Nebs 'n Debs (Prequel) by Chris Cacciatore
    Purchase full, physical versions of Twin Dragons and Nebs 'n Debs here, or digital versions here and here respectively.
  • Filthy Kitchen by Dustin Long
  • Lala the Magical, Cheril the Goddess,  Wo xiang niào niào,
    and Zombie Calavera (Prologue) by The Mojon Twins (Links NSFW)
  • Sinking Feeling by Lauri Kasanen
  • Brick Breaker by Aleff Correa, aka Punch
  • Flappy Jack and Rock Paper Scissors Lizard Sbock by Doug Fraker
  • Jupiter Scope 2: Operation Europa by Nin-kuuku
  • Karate Kick by Mike J. Moffitt
  • The Paths of Bridewell by zkip
  • Spacey McRacey by Nathan Tolbert
  • Super Tilt Bro. by Sylvain Gadrat
  • Waddles the Duck by cppchriscpp
  • Haunted: Halloween '85 (Demo) by Damian Yerrick
    and Retrotainment Games 
    Purchase full versions (for Famicom or NES) here.
  • Lunar Limit and Ralph 4 by pubby
  • 240p Test Suite by Damian Yerrick
  • Button Logger and Musical Controller by Johnathan Roatch

Some entries may have newer versions elsewhere, sometimes even in future volumes of Action 53. This collection retains the same versions available at the time this volume was released.

Action 53 Menu Program by Damian Yerrick.
Cover art, box, and label design by M-Tee Graphics.

Links

Purchase physical copies at the Infinite NES Lives Product Page.
